articles.author: Erica Pandey
articles.title: The pipeline for Ph.D.s out of U.S. universities is shrinking - Axios
articles.description: America graduates more Ph.D.s than any other country. They go on to invent things, cure diseases and win Nobel Prizes. But admission slots are disappearing.
articles.content: <ul><li>There are some permanent effects, said Emily Levesque, an astronomer at the University of Washington.Therell be students who never got to pursue Ph.D.s. Thats a group of experts thats lost fo… [+2385 chars]
